scripts.deploy:cosmosbridge: cd contracts && dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'echo $COSMOS_PRIVATE_KEY && forge script script/DeployCosmosBridge.sol:CosmosBridgeScript --rpc-url node --private-key $COSMOS_PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --slow'

scripts.deploy:base-sepolia: cd contracts && dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'echo $PRIVATE_KEY && forge script script/DeployCosmosBridge.sol:CosmosBridgeScript --rpc-url base_sepolia --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast'
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-sepolia: cd contracts && dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'echo $PRIVATE_KEY && forge script script/DeployCosmosBridge.sol:CosmosBridgeScript --rpc-url arbitrum_sepolia --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast'
